author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Lupin Makes the List Again
body:
According to Animage, Lupin III(first series) and Cagliostro made the top 
100 anime productions. The first series seems to be in the top 10, and over 
the original GUNDAM, no less! The url for this is 
http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/article.php?id=55
